Package emissary.kff

Class KffChain

  • java.lang.Object
    • emissary.kff.KffChain
  • public class KffChain
extends Object
    Keep a list of hash algorithm names and compute them and compare the results to the ordered chain of KFF filter when data is submitted.

      • check

        public KffResult check​(String itemName,
                       byte[] content)
                throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Check content on our chain in the order loaded Data smaller than minDataSize will get hashes computed but can never be reported as KNOWN data.
        Returns:
        result of check
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException

      • check

        public KffResult check​(String itemName,
                       SeekableByteChannelFactory sbcf)
                throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                       IOException
        Check content on our chain in the order loaded Data smaller than minDataSize will get hashes computed but can never be reported as KNOWN data.
        Returns:
        result of check
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the checksum can't be calculated
        IOException - if an error occurred reading the data

        Returns:
